verses.verse: While I <S%H2416>live,<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to my God as long as I <S%H430>exist.<s%>
<S%H982>Don't<s%> put your trust in <S%H5081>princes,<s%> each a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> in whom there is no <S%H8668>help.<s%>
His <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3318>departs,<s%> and he <S%H7725>returns<s%> to the <S%H127>earth.<s%> In that very <S%H3117>day,<s%> his <S%H6250>thoughts<s%> <S%H6>perish.<s%>
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is he who has the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for his <S%H5828>help,<s%> whose <S%H7664>hope<s%> is in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H430>God:<s%>
who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and all that is in <S%H8104>them;<s%> who keeps <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%>

who <S%H6213>executes<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H6231>oppressed;<s%> who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5425>frees<s%> the <S%H631>prisoners.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6491>opens<s%> the eyes of the <S%H5787>blind.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2210>raises<s%> up those who are bowed <S%H3721>down.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigners.<s%> He <S%H5749>upholds<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widow,<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he turns upside <S%H5791>down.<s%>
